2015-1870 (La. 9/16/16)

STATE of Louisiana v. Justin Granger SMITH NO. 2015-KO-1870 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 16, 2016

Applying For Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. F, No. 538114; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2015 KA 0186

[ denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant.
